nodes.text: Lemnai were nocturnal creatures that lived on the plains of Vendaxa, a world known to have one of the densest ecosystems in the galaxy. They were about a meter long and had leathery skin that ranged from black to brown.[source?] The leathery-shelled creatures were a common prey of the acklay, who roamed the plains by day in search of lemnai asleep in their dens.
